spec.text: Greenhouse Documentation Greenhouse Logs Plugin Documentation Greenhouse Extensions GitHub Repository OpenTelemetry Documentation

display.name: Log Records ${metric}
display.description: Accepted: count/rate of log records successfully pushed into the pipeline.

display.name: Refused Log Records ${metric}
display.description: Refused: count/rate of log records that could not be pushed into the pipeline.

display.name: Metric Points ${metric}
display.description: Accepted: count/rate of metric points successfully pushed into the pipeline.

display.name: Refused Metric Points ${metric}
display.description: Refused: count/rate of metric points that could not be pushed into the pipeline

display.name: Batch Metrics 1
display.description: Number of times the batch was sent due to a size trigger. Number of times the batch was sent due to a timeout trigger.

spec.seriesNameFormat: Batch sent due to a size trigger: {{processor}}
Batch sent due to a timeout trigger: {{processor}} {{service_instance_id}}

display.name: Batch Metrics 2
display.description:
Sent: count/rate of spans successfully sent to destination.\nEnqueue: count/rate of spans failed to be added to the sending queue.
Failed: count/rate of spans in failed attempts to send to destination.

display.name: Spans ${metric}
display.description:
Sent: count/rate of metric points successfully sent to destination.
Enqueue: count/rate of metric points failed to be added to the sending queue.
Failed: count/rate of metric points in failed attempts to send to destination.

display.name: Metric Points ${metric}
display.description:
Sent: count/rate of metric points successfully sent to destination.
Enqueue: count/rate of metric points failed to be added to the sending queue.
Failed: count/rate of metric points in failed attempts to send to destination.

display.name: Total RSS Memory
display.description: Total bytes of memory obtained from the OS (see 'go doc runtime.MemStats.Sys')

display.name: Total Runtime Sys Memory
display.description: Bytes of allocated heap objects (see 'go doc runtime.MemStats.HeapAlloc')

display.name: Total Runtime Heap Memory
display.description: Total CPU user and system time in percentage

display.name: CPU Usage
display.description: Total CPU user and system time in percentage

display.name: Service Instance Count
display.description: Total CPU user and system time in percentage

display.name: Uptime by Service Instance
display.description: Number of service instances, which are reporting metrics

display.name: Service Instance Details
display.description: Number of service instances, which are reporting metrics

display.name: Pods
display.description:
Added: Number of pod add events received.
Updated: Number of pod update events received.
Deleted: Number of pod delete events received.

display.name: Namespaces
display.description:
Added: Number of namespace add events received.
Updated: Number of namespace update events received.

display.name: Additional Grouping
display.description: Detailed metrics must be configured in the collector configuration. They add grouping by transport protocol (http/grpc) for receivers.
